title: AnyPresence Wins Top API Infrastructure Innovation Award at Integrate 2015
text:
JustAPIs recognized as a powerful solution for building RESTful APIs
Reston, Virginia (PRWEB) October 01, 2015
AnyPresence, the leading enterprise platform for digital transformation, today announced that JustAPIs was named an innovation award winner in API Infrastructure at Integrate 2015. JustAPIs is a revolutionary solution for accelerating the development of modern, RESTful APIs for web, mobile, and IoT applications.
“We’re honored to receive the Integrate 2015 Innovation Award for Top API Infrastructure,” said Anirban Chakrabarti, CEO of AnyPresence. “JustAPIs empowers developers to easily create standalone microservices, API-enable databases, and modernize legacy web services, all of which helps to accelerate digital transformation in today’s enterprise. It was great to see the Integrate hackathon participants prove this out in real-time.”
Aimed at enterprise application developers, JustAPIs provides a compelling way to quickly and easily create APIs and deploy them to any cloud, on-premise, or IoT microcomputer infrastructure, so that organizations can enable app ecosystems around them. JustAPIs was chosen by online crowd vote, and received their award at the Integrate 2015 conference held at the Santa Clara Convention Center, September 28-30.
Integrate + API World 2015 is the nation’s largest API and integration conference, hosting 3,000 executives and entrepreneurs as well as more than 200 speakers from companies such as Google, Facebook, Slack, Cisco, and Zendesk. AnyPresence also presented at the event on the topics including “rapid API building” and “enabling developer ecosystems.”
“The technology industry is moving away from purchasing standalone tech products and moving towards building ecosystems of integrated tech solutions,” said Geoff Domoracki, founder of Integrate 2015. “JustAPIs is a perfect example of the new wave of integration-centric services, and we’re excited about their participation in our conference.”
To learn more about JustAPIs or to download the free developer version, visit: http://www.justapis.com
About AnyPresence
AnyPresence is an enterprise platform for digital transformation that enables API microservices, enterprise mobility, and IoT app ecosystem initiatives. AnyPresence is venture-backed and was founded in 2011 by former SAP, Oracle and Cisco executives. The platform empowers users to build APIs and cross-platform apps following IT governance and best practices. The patented AnyPresence architecture provides source code access to UI test kits, SDKs, and backend servers, which can be deployed in the cloud or on-premise. The solution can uniquely support innovation ecosystems of users and citizen developers from any web portal. AnyPresence is recognized for its award-winning technology and unparalleled customer service, and reliably powers thousands of APIs and apps for large enterprises including Citi, Jabil, MasterCard and Schneider Electric. For more information, visit http://www.anypresence.com .
